column5: hey guys  on the way back in form simcoe yesterday towing the hut behind a sled without a cover I think when we hit a bump my transducer for my VX1 bounced outa the holder and musta ripped off. When we got back in it wasnt there and with 6-8" of snow on simcoe no way we would find it. I dont think that it coulda been repaired since it ripped right off of the cord. what a kick in the boys that was since we got skunked  Anyone know somewhere in canada to purchase one ASAP? I need one by the weekend  possible to run a vexilar ducer with the marcum unit? would make it much easier to find one  Nate  thanks guys
Call Fishing World in Hamilton at 1-888-258-0564.
Yep Fishing World should have them.  905 573 2288
called them they dont sell the transducer itself just the actual units  Nate
Nater,  give this guy a call:  http://www.reeldr.com/  He should be able to set you up with a new transducer.  Cheers, Ice Fisherman
2 swings and 2 misses lol...this sucks  Nate
Your best bet is to contact Marcum directly. They should be able to help you out.

OK ,  Why don't you get it directly from MarCum? I've ordered replacement charger for my LX-5 a year ago and got if few days after ordering it.  763-493-3748 [emailÂ protected] They may reffer you to a near by dealer too.  Cheers, Ice Fisherman
